column2: "I heard that you survived being attacked by swarms of Darkers on Naberius during the graduation test!"
"Yo! Nice too meet you! I'm an ARKS trainee called Lubert!"
"I came here to learn from you after hearing so much about you, and because I want to be a great ARKS!"
"I know we just met, but I have a request! Garongo is one of the native Naberians, right!"
"Would you show me the fastest way to beat them by attacking their weak points and delivering the killing blow?!"
